command_line: mkdir -p circos/conf/ circos/data/ &&  ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/6/9/4/dataset_694220ba-d0f4-4a98-a7ee-6e53f2eb1071.dat' genomeref.fa &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-from-fasta.py' genomeref.fa > circos/conf/karyotype.txt &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-colors.py' `grep -c '^chr\s' 'circos/conf/karyotype.txt'` > 'circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf' &&  touch circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf &&    cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp10nv2euw' circos/conf/circos.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpw7gjes35' circos/conf/ticks.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp2ifxo8h1' circos/conf/ideogram.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp2p4q429_'  circos/conf/data.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpl4p0ddky'  circos/conf/links.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpfx_vb7pd' circos/conf/galaxy_test_case.json &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/d/9/dataset_3d9cdcc8-74ad-47e1-925f-a7e9e004bd7d.dat' circos/data/data-0.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/d/9/dataset_3d9cdcc8-74ad-47e1-925f-a7e9e004bd7d.dat' circos/data/data-1.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/f/2/6/dataset_f261834c-0f27-4fd1-b2c2-8b1da3fe9d69.dat' circos/data/data-2.txt &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/6/a/5/dataset_6a5c8b1f-bd27-49a0-9559-730de67bf611.dat' circos/data/links-0.txt &&   circos -conf circos/conf/circos.conf -noparanoid

params.ideogram: {"angle_offset": "-90", "angle_orientation": "clockwise", "bands": {"band_stroke_color": "#000000", "band_stroke_thickness": "0", "band_transparency": "3", "fill_bands": true, "show_bands": true}, "chromosomes_reverse": null, "ideogram_labels": {"parallel": true, "radius_offset": "0.075", "show_label": true, "size": "24"}, "limit_chromosomes": null, "pairwise_spacing": [], "radius": "0.9", "spacing": "0.5", "thickness": "30.0", "units": "kb"}
